review: Dr.Nikhil is so good that treatment became a cake walk for us .Dr was always available whenever problem arised.It was a complicated case ,jaws was not aligned &many more teeth issues but now each & every problem sorted, Dr.gave my son a new makeover.Thank you so much Dr.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Nikhil treated my daughter for teeth braces treatment. He is thorough professional and a master hand. He showed great patience when the treatment got extended due to lockdown and thereafter teeth were slow to respond. He never compromised with quality of result. We all were very happy to see the outcome of treatment. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: overall a very satisfactory experience. Doctor’s expertise on the subject is commendable and the best part is that he educates you fully on the process, material used, pros and cons and the precautions to be taken. the couple’s friendly nature helped to sail through the treatment like a breeze. highly recommended. 10 on 10

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had pain in my wisdom tooth due to decay, but I was skeptical to visit a dentist due to the current Covid-19 pandemic. However, When I visited Dr. Surana's clinic, to my relief I observed that they were taking all the precautionary measures like regularly sanitising the clinic, checking patient's temperature and oxygen levels, wearing PPE kits etc. Dr Surana explained to me in detail about my condition and how it could be fixed. Having OCD I tend to ask too many questions, however, Dr. Surana heard all my doubts patiently and cleared them all. My treatment was carried out extremely safely and now I'm pain free. I would definitely recommend Dr Surana to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: I visited doctor Nikhil for my daughters teeth alignment. Doctor explain all the possible treatment modalities available and we choose to go for invisible aligners. Totally satisfied with the treatment planning and outcome. The doctor is very polite and explain and educates the patient very nicely. I also visited the doctor for my implants,, got my two implants done and I am very happy with the treatment. Would highly recommend Dr Surana.
